name: Beyond Fusion
text: (This cardâ€™s name is always treated as "Polymerization".) Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck using monsters from your hand, field or deck as material. If this card is in your GY, except during the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card from your GY to add 1 "Beyond Fusion" from your Deck to your Hand. You can only use each effect of "Beyond Fusion" once per turn.
